resources.string: You can start to look up words while indexing
Song: Shape Of You --- Ed Sheeran

 From "Drawing driving route directions between two locations"
 BY George Mathew
 -- "http://wptrafficanalyzer.in/blog/drawing-driving-route-directions-between-two-locations-using-google-directions-in-google-map-android-api-v2/"

\ This game is played just like regular Scroggle game. The difference is that this game has 2 phases. you have to find as many words as you can in phase 1.\n\ \n\ In phase 2, you will use characters you matched in phase 1.

\ The GREEN tile means it is available. You can make move in these green tiles.

 The YELLOW tile means it is selected by you. You cannot change the state of yellow tiles.

 The RED tile means it is your last move. You can change your last move by cliking red tile again.

 The PINK tile means it is matched You cannot change any matched tiles.

 ****If you start a new game and the green tiles has no response to your cliking. Please just wait for a second, it is loading the game.
The Log Token button logs the Registration token to the log. The Send Notification Button sends the notification to the client device.

\ Your Goal: Collect COINS to Level Up

 Red Coin: Placed by Yourself and Can not Be Collected

 Gold Coin: Placed by Other Players and Can Be Collected



Start Running!
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
